channel.title: e-commerce on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in e-commerce on FinanClub

item.title: 1025 JD
item.description: score:1025 Chances: The projected fair value for JD.com is US$63.64 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity, suggesting potential upside in the stock. JD.com plans to release its unaudited financial results for the three months and six months ended June 30, 2023, which could provide insights into the company’s financial performance.

item.title: 1151 CPNG
item.description: score:1151 Chances: Coupang’s estimated fair value is US$25.12 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity. E-commerce industry indicators, such as predictions of growth for Amazon and other players, suggest a potential bounce back for Coupang. Coupang’s stock saw a double-digit share price rise in the recent past.

item.title: 1036 W
item.description: score:1036 Chances: Shares of Wayfair (W) beat the market this week, gaining 9% through Thursday trading compared to a 2% decline in the wider market. Wayfair made important progress in the second quarter, particularly on the cost-cutting front, boosting its gross margin and reducing operating costs.

item.title: 1142 BABA
item.description: score:1142 Chances: The outlook for e-commerce players like Alibaba is strengthening, making it a viable space to invest in for 2023 and beyond. Alibaba’s cloud computing unit releasing open-source AI models could expand the company’s influence in the field of generative AI and drive innovation.

item.title: 1052 CVNA
item.description: score:1052 Chances: Carvana’s stock (CVNA) has experienced significant gains of approximately 900% this year, showing positive momentum and strong performance. Carvana launched same-day delivery in Arizona, introducing a new level of speed and convenience for customers, which could enhance customer satisfaction and boost sales.

item.title: 0889 SHOP
item.description: score:889 Chances: Despite Shopify posting better-than-expected second-quarter revenue and adjusted earnings per share, analysts upgraded their 12-month price targets for the stock after digesting the solid results. Shopify’s second-quarter results benefited from growth in merchant solutions revenues and an expanding merchant base. Shopify’s President, Harley Finkelstein, discussed how the e-commerce company is approaching a potential U.

item.title: 1244 AMZN
item.description: score:1244 Chances: Amazon.com, Inc. beats earnings expectations with an EPS of $0.65 compared to the expected $0.34. The e-commerce and cloud-computing leader, Amazon.com, showed strong growth and gained over 8% in stock value after reporting quarterly earnings.
